CustomField.description: Event Start Date does not match Event Year or Event Quarter or Event Month.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Event_Year__c ) ), YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c) <> Event_Year__c ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Event_Month__c) ) ), CASE( MONTH(Event_Start_Date__c), 1, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "January", "1", ""), 2, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "February", "1", ""), 3, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "March", "1", ""), 4, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "April", "1", ""), 5, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "May", "1", ""), 6, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "June", "1", ""), 7, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "July", "1", ""), 8, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "August", "1", ""), 9, IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "September", "1", ""), 10,IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "October", "1", ""), 11,IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "November", "1", ""), 12,IF (TEXT(Event_Month__c) <> "December", "1", ""), "") = "1" ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Event_Start_Date__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) ) ), CASE( MONTH(Event_Start_Date__c), 1, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), 2, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), 3, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q1", "1", ""), 4, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), 5, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), 6, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q2", "1", ""), 7, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), 8, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), 9, IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q3", "1", ""), 10,IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), 11,IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), 12,IF (TEXT(Event_Quarter__c) <> "Q4", "1", ""), "") = "1" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Event Start Date does not match Event Year or Event Quarter or Event Month.
CustomField.label: Date Mismatch 1
